org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery
Class AeXQueryFunction

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.saxon.expr.ComputedExpression
      net.sf.saxon.expr.FunctionCall
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery.AeXQueryFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sf.saxon.expr.Container, net.sf.saxon.expr.Expression, net.sf.saxon.trace.InstructionInfoProvider, java.io.Serializable, javax.xml.transform.SourceLocator
public class AeXQueryFunction
extends net.sf.saxon.expr.FunctionCall

This class wraps a generic ActiveBPEL expression function into something that the Saxon XQuery processor can use.

See Also:
Serialized Form
